title.value: Studying the Practices of Testing Machine Learning Software in the Wild
title.justification: The title is extracted directly from the paper.
title.quote: Studying the Practices of Testing Machine Learning Software in the Wild

extractions.description: The paper presents a study on the testing practices of machine learning engineers. It analyzes 11 open-source machine learning software systems to identify common testing strategies, tested machine learning properties, and testing methods.

type.justification: The paper conducts an empirical study by analyzing existing machine learning software systems.
type.quote: we perform the first fine-grained empirical study

name.justification: The study focuses on the practices of testing machine learning software, which falls under the research field of Software Engineering.
name.quote: Studying the Practices of Testing Machine Learning Software in the Wild

name.justification: The study specifically investigates testing practices in the context of Machine Learning software.
name.quote: Studying the Practices of Testing Machine Learning Software in the Wild

name.justification: The paper analyzes testing strategies related to software quality assurance in Machine Learning.
name.quote: software quality of these systems is yet an open challenge
